thread.title: Chinese smartphone companies push Apple aside
thread.title_full: Chinese smartphone companies push Apple aside

title: Chinese smartphone companies push Apple aside
text:
Chinese smartphone companies push Apple aside Sunday, 18 October 2015 12:20 PM Apple is no longer the top smart phone maker in China. Two local companies now account for one third of the sales in the country. 
(Source: Al Jazeera English YouTube channel) More Videos Over reliance on smartphones and tablets is eroding our ability to remember, that's the conclusion of a new study into digital amnesia.
